subject: Skiing
Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marcus Hellner and Charlotte Kalla of Sweden won their first World Cup cross-country ski titles. In Gallivare, Sweden, Hellner edged Pietro Piller Cottrer of Italy by 1.4 seconds in the 15-kilometer freestyle, and Kalla cruised past Marit Bjorgen of Norway by 24.4 in the 10K freestyle.
